title: Item group - create new (e.g. for shipping)
text: Under Maintenance, click Item Groups. Check which 99- number hasn't been used and use one of those. They are without barcode and EAN number
description: Under Maintenance, click Item Groups. Check which 99- number hasn't been used and use one of those. They are without barcode and EAN number

title: Item group – does not show
text: The customer has created a new item group, which does not show on POS. POS: Backoffice: Type CHANGEPULL in the sales assistant field. Remember that it can take some time for it to finis If the item group has been created in Backoffice, but is still not showing up on the POS, use the SQL Server Management Studio on the pc. Database / POS / Tables / dbo.ItemGroups Create the item group as a new line and run reload on the POS
description:
The customer has created a new item group, which does not show on POS. 

  

POS: 


Backoffice:  

Type CHANGEPULL in the sales assistant field. Remember that it can take some time for it to finis

If the item group has been created in Backoffice, but is still not showing up on the POS, use the SQL Server Management Studio on the pc. 

  

Database / POS / Tables / dbo.ItemGroups 

Create the item group as a new line and run reload on the POS

title: Item group - May not be shown in salesoverview
text: Check in support tools Find customer -> Edit selected client -> return to group setup -> system codes Check: Last product group included in sale: Create item groups below that number
description:
Check in support tools 

  

Find customer -> Edit selected client -> return to group setup -> system codes 

  

Check: Last product group included in sale:  

  

Create item groups below that number

title: Item group – remove / delete item group
text: Item groups can only be removed if there have been no transactions connected to them. If they have been used, you can rename it to DO NOT USE.
description:
Item groups can only be removed if there have been no transactions connected to them. 

  

If they have been used, you can rename it to DO NOT USE.
